name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta, toss with tomato sauce and olive oil.

name: PB&J Sandwich
instructions: Spread peanut butter and jelly on bread slices, combine.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs and milk, cook in pan, add cheese before folding.

name: Naan Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on naan, add cheese, bake at 425Â°F for 10 min.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: Fry rice with soy sauce and scrambled eggs.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado, spread on toasted bread, sprinkle salt.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, cook with butter, stir until soft.

name: Salad Bowl
instructions: Chop veggies, toss with olive oil.
